about_the_game:
Drake's Dungeon is an adult, roguelite survival game. Your job is to eliminate hordes of monsters by shooting them down or destroying them with spells. Pick your class, then create unique builds with different items and spells on every run. Buy class upgrades to unlock new story and adult artwork.

Game features
  • 3 Dungeons
  • Upgradeable Characters Classes
  • Various Spells and Items
  • Rich Story 130k+ Words
  • 25+ Adult scenes
  • Optional Voiceover DLC

The Story

The story transpires in the notorious dungeon, Labyrinthe. Part tavern, part brothel, Labyrinthe is a venue for the seedy demon world to come together and revel in their own debauchery.

Owned and empowered by the nefarious imp, Luro, the dungeon itself is partly alive. Labyrinthe hears your thoughts and desires… Its walls shift and its rooms reform to suit your needs. Needless to say, the cocky, dick-dragging Drake has spent many a night plundering its depths.

But now, a strange, malevolent power has begun to seep through its stony walls. The black poison is infecting the dungeon's demonic patrons, wiping their minds and amplifying their savage natures, turning them away from debauchery to brutality.

Luro is all for a little chaos, but chaos he can control... Unable to contend with these violent mutations, he enlists Drake as his personal bodyguard to see him safely into the depths of the dungeon to find the source of the infectious evil.

Of course, Luro has his own designs for his muscular companion... He may be trying to stop a murderous, demonic outbreak, but why not have a little fun along the way? He will ensure his handsome bodyguard gets worked to the fullest extent of his ability.

Drake's Dungeon features guest appearances by Deimos (Class Comics) and Derek (Crown’s Reverie) alongside new and familiar faces. Each hunk will find themselves getting entangled in Luro’s schemes. Between the imp’s lusty manipulations and the dungeon’s potent danger, how will any of these brave hunks ever make it out on top?

content_descriptors.notes:
Drake's Dungeon is a sexually explicit game. The story features characters seeking out varied sexual encounters in a demonic brothel. Many of the scenes feature bondage and manipulation. There are brawls, scenes of violence, and alcohol use.

If you are sensitive to any of these themes, please refrain from playing the game.

name: Drake's Dungeon

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 2500U (or equivalent)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Vega 8 Integrated Graphics (or equivalent)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

dejus.descriptors:
Violência fantasiosa
Linguagem imprópria
Conteúdo sexual

short_description: An adult, survival game where hunky men battle hordes of lusty monsters! The more monsters you kill, the more sticky, sweaty, muscle-packed story you'll unlock. Better start whackin'.
